class GifDecoder

Detailed Description

Represents a GIF87a or GIF89a image.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

ID 

Reimplemented from Image.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

GifImage::GifImage (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

GifImage::GifImage (  BinData *  bin_data,
BOOLEAN *  success = 0
) 
 

Parameters:
bin_data Pointer to a binary data stream which contains the GIF-data. After passing the binary data stream, the stream is obtained by the GIF-image and hence automatically released in the destructor of the GIF-image.
success Output-parameter, which indicates whether the initialization has been successful.
